website_summaries.verdict: As long as it fits comfortably, this minimizer bra has plenty of style and comfort for an affordable price.
pros: Style meets comfort and support with this budget-friendly minimizer
Details such as lace top panels and a bow in the center add a feminine touch
cons: A handful of women note the underwire is very high in front
In some cases, it can stick out or dig into the skin

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this bra. It’s super comfortable and true to size. It’s not a sexy lingerie type of bra but definitely still nice. And holds the girls in place and nice lift. I got a 38G
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bra, but.....
customer_reviews.text: Great bra, fits good, and is pretty comfortable, but after the first wash the linning literally fell apart 😢 if the linning didn't fall apart it would've been the best bra I currently own.
customer_reviews.author: Polly N.

customer_reviews.title: Good, Supportive bra
customer_reviews.text: I'm 34DDD and it's hard to find this size anywhere, specially at a decent price. Unlike other minimizers I've bought in the past, these don't squash and spread my boobs. This bra lifts and supports your breasts well (another plus: the lift makes me looks skinnier!) . If I could change one thing, it would be for the bra to have a smooth front as the lines show through some shirts....all in all, not so bad as I rather have the lines show through than have my boobs spread about making them (and me) look even bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Noelia Nataly

customer_reviews.title: BUY ONE- Comfort, style A+
customer_reviews.text: This bra exceeded my expectations. At Victoria Secret, I measured as a 36 DDD. I measured my chest again and went for the 36 DDD in black. It feels very supportive! It does not dig into my shoulders and the underwire doesn't poke my ribs or press super tightly. The band is so smooth and soft and eliminates back rolls!! HUGE PLUS. Only con, the underwire does creak slightly upon first wearing it. It's not as severe as other bras I've had, but it's still there. I just have to say, for large breasted girls, it's TRUE to size, so comfortable I can sleep in it, and a very decent bra for support.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: poor fabric quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a month, this is the only the second time that i wash the bra, the lining inside the bra tear apart, so did the actual bra itself. The fit is great but it is poor quality
customer_reviews.author: tina wang

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a grey bra and a black bra
customer_reviews.text: These bras are very comfortable to wear! They feel like high quality bras and the price is great. I like that there is a small added layer of fabric sewn behind the lace fabric. I’m going to buy more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Family

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfortable, but maybe runs a little small?
customer_reviews.text: I'm wearing this bra for the first time today. I'm normally a size 40D/DD, but for this bra I ordered a 42DD. It fits like a damn glove. I like the wider band. I feel like it's not going to move, no spillage, and I get great lift. It's cute as hell, too. I've been looking for one bra to replace the crappy ones I hate wearing every day (Hanes and Calvin Klein T-shirt bras), so I'm going to try the 40DD to see how the fit differs. For those questing for cheap bras that don't suck, I ordered the Vanity Fair Women's Breathable Luxe Full Coverage Padded Underwire Bra 75291. It fits well, feels stable, and isn't hideous.
customer_reviews.author: Mabel Pirout

customer_reviews.title: the wire is made by aliens, but the rest of the bra is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: The cups and band are the right size, but the wire is MESSED up... it bends out and away from your chest... it's the worst shaped wire I have ever seen. The cups are the correct size, if I hold the wire to my center chest the cups are perfect, and comfortable and supportive, but the wires are sewn into the bra in the wrong way/ place. The person who made the band, did a great job. The person who made the cups, they were spot on... the person who made the underwire has never seen a human female before, and I think breasts scare and confuse them.
customer_reviews.author: Amyzon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. I have been buying these at JC ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. I have been buying these at JC Penny for years, but they are very expensive to purchase them there. I was so happy to find them here. All the hooks fell out in a short time and one of the wire broke. This has never happened before. The bra fits as expected, but if I selected one other option, it wouldn't allow me to do a review. Something is wrong with this bra. Maybe the fabric was dry rotted. It was way cheaper, but I guess I got what you paid for. I wish I could get my money back. Poor Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, full coverage, side and back support...one issue though where the lace is joined at the seam...the lace came torn...like a factory defect seems it pulled out of the seam...otherwise magnificent bra!!!! Would return but cant bother will find a way to fix that.... Update after a full day wear: The center of the bra that sits between the breast is poking out..like a small gap forward, so if you have on a form fitting top...you can see it...maybe the wire is just a bit wide in the center
customer_reviews.author: marcine d.

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy
customer_reviews.text: First of all, thank you for carrying my size (34G) and offering it at such a reasonable price. It's difficult to find bras in my size and even harder to find them at such a good price. The fit is acceptable (the band is perfect and there is no bulging out of the cup, I would just prefer more separation of the breasts). The material is comfortable. I was worried because it looked lacy and make me itchy, but there is sheer material behind the lace, protecting my sensitive skin. It looks good under snug shirts, even with the barely noticeable seam. I count this one as a win and will be ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: girlie4zuz

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The gore (middle part) does not tack to the sternum. There’s no cup size larger for me to try and see if that fixes the problem but it’s a very long gore which could also be a reason why. I don’t notice any spillage but this is a fuller coverage bra. The sides are pretty high as well. Shape isn’t perfectly round but it really depends on your natural shape. Stitching is meh. You can see a spot at the top of one cup where they didn’t complete a stitch all the way to the end. Out of necessity and because the price was so low I won’t return it. It’s comfortable enough to wear in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bra.
customer_reviews.text: I have an incredibly love hate relationship with bras, being a busty gal. But this is my bra! Finally! Very supportive, great under t-shirts. I'm very busty and this minimizes the appearance of my bust slightly so I feel like I can wear things I felt embarrassed about wearing before. I really love the comfort and support of this bra. Only downside is that it's not lined, so if you're embarrassed about things like hard nipples showing through a shirt or dress, well I still recommend this bra but you may want to buy some inserts to protect your modesty. I'll be buying several more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: I would keep looking unless your cup size is small
customer_reviews.text: Bra fit good the first few times, seems to not cover my boobs at the top now. Looks like im overflowing from my bra, usually on one side is worse then the other. This is a problem for me bc i have large boobs 42G so i like for my stuff to be tied down and secure not jiggly and all over the place. Also the inside material is very thin and starts to rip and the wholes are visible through shirts. Doesn't give the best of boob shape either. I like mine round like a ball not a cone pointed downward but it is because of the material and how its made
customer_reviews.author: LayLay795

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best Fit
customer_reviews.text: A little tighter in the band than expected, I use an extender to make it work. The middle wire portion that is meant to lay flat against the chest pokes forward and shows through my shirt but keeping the straps tight seem to fix that for the most part. The line acrossed the breast also shows through with some fabrics, even with an undershirt. The cups fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: The straps are stretchy so you don't get a good hold especially for big heavy boobs
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 36 G so it's hard finding bras I decided to try this bra in particular because of some of the reviews. Unfortunately this wasn't a hit for me, I wore this bra for the first time to work and did I make a mistake. I spent all day lifting up the underwire for relief from it digging into my skin. The straps are stretchy so you don't get a good hold especially for big heavy boobs. I must say it is a pretty bra but for big boobs this is a NO.
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Bra
customer_reviews.text: This has become my favorite bra. I’ve had breast cancer, and the lumpectomy and radiation caused me to have one breast a bit smaller and perkier than the other, finding a bra that fits both the girls is plenty hard. This bra checks all the boxes, it’s pretty, I don’t fall out of it, it doesn’t give me the dreaded “stuffed sausage” line across the top of my boobs, and by some stroke of magic it fits both my boobs and actually makes them look the same size. I wear this bra a lot, and it has held together fine...that said, I never put my bras in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gagel

customer_reviews.title: OMG YES
customer_reviews.text: I've been dying with quadboob for awhile now.. my own fault of course, gaining a little weight and not buying any new bras. Well. THATS OVER! Because this bra fits amazing. I don't have to fidget all day "adjusting" and wondering if anyone can notice how crazy my boobs look. So thankful! I got a 36G & it's a dream. I have it on the tightest hooks so I'm thinking of trying 34G.. but either way. This is so comfortable, flattering and full coverage (what I prefer). I will def buy again and again. I'm so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ang Swin

customer_reviews.title: Makes me look great but ripped into shreds almost immediately
customer_reviews.text: 36DD here, and this is the best looking bra I have in terms of how I look in it. I bought this one years ago at a store, and it lasted a good amount of time. But now, I purchased this again after the old one tore, and this time around, when I bought here on Amazon, it started tearing after the first wash, and each time I put it on it would rip more and more. I can't wear it anymore because all the layers are completely torn. It's like they're cutting costs on quality or I bought a counterfeit. Something's off.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Cat Designs

customer_reviews.title: I love this bra!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is really comfortable. I bought one over a year ago, and have worn it often. I machine wash it and hang to dry. It's still in excellent condition, so I decided to buy another. I forgot my sports bra going to the gym the other day, so I ended up wearing this. It was really supportive. It is not the sexiest bra ever, but it's good looking enough, and very flattering. I can wear it with all but my lowest cut tops. The price is very affordable. I've spent 3 times the amount on other bras, and I'd say they're comparable quality, fit, style.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Horn

customer_reviews.title: Nice bra, wrong color pictured
customer_reviews.text: The bra itself is fine but the picture is a black lace with flowers on it. The color I received is a beige color. When I went back to look and see if I ordered the wrong thing I noticed it is the picture of the black bra but the name does say latte. I was only looking at the picture when I was clicking on the different colors available and ordered the colors I like. Oh well, lesson learned. I’ll keep it because I like the style, just wish it was the black color that is in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime L.

customer_reviews.title: Some good and some not
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased 4 of this style in different colors. 2 of the 4 started to have the elastic fibers break down on the sides. They were all laundered the same way and worn about the same amount. Not sure why they wore out in about 8 months. The manufacturer did refund the money which was good...but I hate buying bras...and these fit so well and didn’t have all the unnecessary padding others do. I would say buy them and try them. They may last longer for you.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, good value, okay fit.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, pretty, straps stay up, but center gore is too close together and stands out from my sternum. I wear it around the house. Nice padding on the underwire. Good side fabric to smooth that extra blubber. Seams show TREMENDOUSLY through fabrics, so not for wear with a knit fabric. Cheap enough to have as a house bra.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: No support, gives you a unicorn boob!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra hoping that it would fit my rather large breasts...unfortunately it did not. The support is horrible, it's one of those bras that ends up looking like a point sticking out in the middle of your chest, because it won't lay flat in between your breasts. Then it rides up in the back, no matter hot tight I buckle it in back, it's just not a well made bra, at least not for people who need support and coverage. I am a 38DDD
customer_reviews.author: Wen from S.F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find an affordable bra that fits well. I needed something that was smooth to wear under thinner blouses but still cute. I had bought this same model a few years ago in a grey purple just for the color. It became my favorite and is still holding up. However, I don't machine dry my delicates which gives them years of more life. This time I ordered in white and black for practicality and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rose B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for large cup size
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this style for the last 2 years and it's a great fit for me. I'm a 38G and like a lot of people kept beating myself up for not finding the 'right' bra size. I thought I was a 40 DD, nope! It supports on the sides, no front spillover and has a comfortable u-shapped back. Measure, buy and try one. Buy on Amazon prime for a free return if it doesn't fit. If you're wondering if you should, then you're probably not happy with your current fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Inexpensive Bra that Doesn't Last
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this bra fits as pictured, minimizes, offers good support and is comfortable to wear. The downside? They don't last very long without the cup lining tearing where the lacy part is at the top half of the cup. NOTE: I do not abuse my bras: I hand-wash and air dry them. I wear different bras every day. I air them out after wearing. Regardless, these Lilyette bras tear (this is my fourth such bra that has torn in the same location). For the price, however, I just shrug and accept that they will tear within a year of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K.

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!!!
customer_reviews.text: First I followed the directions on measuring myself. It was a first for me. I had been buying the wrong size and since I'm 66...I was buying the wrong size for a long time. I just received the bra today and put it on. It fit perfectly and truly made me look fabulous. I remeasured and as promised, the bra minimized me 1 1/2 inches. I now went from a 36 DD to a 34 DDD. My bust measurement went from a 40" to a 38 1/2". I'm in love with this bra and will be purchasing more. Thank you Lilyette for being the best at what you do.
customer_reviews.author: D. Harris

customer_reviews.title: True Minimizer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bra after searching the internet for reviews of the best minimizer bras. It minimizes more than any other bra I have ever owned. The seeming under the cups is a little odd, but not uncomfortable. I have only worn it for a short try on but so far it is a really good bra. My only complaint would be that the center comes up a little higher than I would like, but that may be what makes it such a good minimizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the color that’s pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The picture shows a Black and Tan bra. The bra I got is tan only. I sent it back in exchange for the one pictured and was still sent the same tan bra. It’s comfortable enough and fits okay. The cups are a little small, but due to losing weight and not boobs, in having a hard time finding a bra that actually fits perfectly. Happy with the size and fit for now.
customer_reviews.author: CLM

customer_reviews.title: the support is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This bra is great. I bought two when they were discounted, around $15 (one last year and one last month.) At first, both looked like they could not fit but, when I got them on, it felt like they were made for me. With most bras, I need to adjust them several times a day because they ride up my back but these stay perfectly in place. If you want support and to minimize, look for this "three section minimizer" in the description: it's brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bra. I have only worn it twice, so I will update if necessary. I wear a 40DDD and this bra was true to size. I was initially afraid of my purchase since I usually buy the bras with foam cups. This bra, though, is extraordinary. My boobs are perfectly in place with no spillage out of the cups. It does minimize somewhat, but it also shapes them so that my shirts and dresses fit a lot better. The bra is so comfortable. I feel like I could wear it to bed if it wanted to. All for a great price. I might buy another in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Fire1082

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price. I'm a 38g and on the first wear I could barely hook the back on the loosest hook but with more wear it broke in and it fits well. The back latching is a little uneven when putting it on but it does the job . Also the straps are kinda short making the bra higher than the boobs (especially for natural chests) before putting them in the cups, so I have to bend over to get them in good but again for the price It does the job. Hope this is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great summer bra
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new bra and after reading reviews I gave it a try. I really like the fit and my only two drawbacks are 1-the pattern can show through fitted clothing and 2- just a little more protection from the cold would offer a lot more confidence. I like the fit and the color though I just have to be careful I don’t get too cold wearing it in public
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but sizing was way off!
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like good quality. But the band size was way off. I always wear a 38DDD. And I even measured myself to order according to the size chart. The cup size was perfect. But the band was so small I couldn't even clasp it. If I had to guess I'd say it was more like a 32 or 34. The straps were also really short. And I usually have my straps tightened way down. Its like they took a small bra and just put larger cups on it. Other than that it was nice looking and felt like good quality. I really wish the sizing was more accurate, because i really wanted this bra to work.
customer_reviews.author: Nick wall

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than the listing and the tag says total rip off.
customer_reviews.text: I am a ddd I ordered a g sized brah thinking it t would he too big but i was wrong this thing feels like a large c to a regular d cup. Im not gonna wear this or waste my time trying to send it back but i definitely wont order from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Angie😁

customer_reviews.title: Great bra, but seller sent me a USED bra!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bra for large breasts, very comfortable for an underwire, but runs a little small. I normally wear a 38 DDD, had to buy a 40 G. This is the second one I've purchased and I love them! I am only giving this 2 stars, however, because the second bra I purchased was used: no tags and the straps had been adjusted. I kept the bra because it wasn't soiled or smelly or anything, and this was the only one listed in my size. If I had been sent a new bra, I would have given a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda McCall

customer_reviews.title: They're concerned with "projection" (how far your beast sticks out) ...
customer_reviews.text: They're concerned with "projection" (how far your breast sticks out), so they make the wires spread out and they end under your armpit. Ouch!
customer_reviews.author: TattooedNurse

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't fit right
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure it's a size in the waste smaller then what I ordered. Bought a 38 G and it fits more like a 36g I have to wear it on the biggest size it will go. It's slightly small in the cup but not horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Tia baird

customer_reviews.title: Loyal Fan of this ultra comfy bra
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth time buying this bra! I had it when I was heavier 7 years ago, then when I lost 65 lbs and needed the lift from losing fat tissue in my boobs. And now that I've gained weight again I've had to buy larger sizes. I couldn't be happier that I've found 34 DDD that fits true to sizing!!! Why can't all bra shopping be this easy! P. S. Since the sizing and fit is perfect, it's so comfortable I can and have slept in this bra multiple times!! 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have dubbed this the 'armpit' bra!
customer_reviews.text: I HATED this bra! I tried this minimizer- well where do your breasts GO when you minimize or SQUEEZE them?...UNDER your armpits!!!!! Gosh, I could not put my arms close to my body- as I laugh thinking about it! Looking in the mirror I looked like a wrestler. Me and bras! Someday I will find the perfect one! It will NOT be a minimizing bra though!
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 Stars: Perfectly fine, just not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Quite a lovely bra, which is rare in plus-size bras. I've had bras that gave me a prettier shape, but this one does okay. It makes the breasts a little more flat and round, while I prefer a more lifted shape. I also prefer firmer support. So, this is a good lounging around bra or a good bra to wear while going grocery shopping on a Saturday morning. But for that date on Saturday night, I'd recommend something that provides a more flattering shape under your clothes.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Finally I found a bra that has just the right amount of support and coverage that I don't feel like I'm falling out of my bra while bending over
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Lilyette by Bali Bra and I don't want to buy any other brand. I am a 38D (5'9" and 154 pounds) in my early 50's. Finally I found a bra that has just the right amount of support and coverage that I don't feel like I'm falling out of my bra while bending over, especially at work. Still comfortable after a long day at work. Great price for an incredible well made product. Like better than my Walcoal Rack bras.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Davis

customer_reviews.title: It makes your breasts perky.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful bra by my favorite brand. I have a set of large breasts (38 G) and this is a great bra for me. I have bought one previously and it has lasted me for years and so much wash and wear. Wonderful bra! Right now it is a bit perky so I will be glad when this bra is a little worn in. I prefer the natural look instead of the false perky look. But that happens after the bra is a little more worn. Over-all great bra, especially for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a small band size and very large cup size, so I've had to shop around and try a bunch of different band/cup combos to find any that would work. This one is great! It's not a perfect fit--the middle part doesn't lay flat against my chest--but it holds up wonderfully and really does minimize the size. I was pretty impressed when I tried it on and saw just how small it made my bust look from the size. The only thing that bothers me is that the lace is a little itchy, but overall it's a very cute bra, definitely more appealing than some other minimizer bras that look frumpy and old.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: This bra has good coverage but the band around the underwire is really thick. It actually caused bruising on my ribcage after wearing it for one day. Maybe the size was off because it seemed pretty big compared to other brands in the same size.
customer_reviews.author: JWPDX

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but NOT A MINIMIZER
customer_reviews.text: I like this bra. It fits well and is comfortable. However - IT IS NOT A MINIMIZER. It's simple to tell. I tried a new blouse on with a regular bra and there was a very slight pull/gap in the front button - not bad, but I just wasn't comfortable with the way it looked. So I began searching Amazon to find a minimizer bra. Suddenly this bra, which I had purchased last month came up in my search. "NO WAY!" I thought. Then, "Great I already have a minimizer bra!" So I tried the new blouse on with this Lilyette bra. The gap was WORSE! Final thoughts: comfortable bra - fits well, BUT NO MINIMIZATION!
customer_reviews.author: Dreaming in Color

customer_reviews.title: Not flattering.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, comfy, seems good quality. But it gives you that awful torpedo boob effect. I'm not trying to look like Madonna. And it is too close to my armpit, which is annoying. But the material is just too lumpy to wear under anything. It is very supportive for large chested girls though. I wear a 34G. I used to wear a 36DD until I discovered /r/abrathatfits, which literally changed my life. I can actually fit into a bra because of that site. With such a large chest, it's very important to have the right size bra. The method where you measure your band then around your nipples and subtract does not work.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Initial review on comfort
customer_reviews.text: 34 ddd ish. My left breast is slight larger (uh, noticeably larger) and this bra is the first bra I've ever worn where they are both comfortably secure. I wish the solid panel was lightly padded to hide pokey nips, but this is the first non-padded bra I will actually wear because of how dang comfortable it is!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Best bra EVER!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly the best bra I have ever owned and I’m 38 years old!!! It is very comfortable and stays in place. I don’t have to adjust during the day. And it definitely minimizes and supports! The color is very pretty. I even wore it to my cardio class today as it provided better support than any of my sports bras. I ordered two more! One in black and the other in in the same rum raisin. This bra also doesn’t cut into me it fits very flush!
customer_reviews.author: Hope McFarland

customer_reviews.title: So gooood! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this brand for years. This is a minimized bra which I love. This bra is well made, has three row books and material that smooths you out. The straps are nice, wide and flat unlike many other bras. I love minimizing bras because my Victoria Secret bras just makes my books look huge, I'm a 36DDD.
customer_reviews.author: M. Velez

customer_reviews.title: Not genuine Bali, very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have this exact make of bra, however, when it arrived it was about 2 sizes too small. I compared the tags on the one I have and this one and it was clear that these aren’t genuine Bali bras.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy I did and I love the Lilyette by Bali ...
customer_reviews.text: 34G I never wore my correct bra size never in my life since wearing bras. I went to a department store and was told a 38 D even tho I sometimes wore a 38DD. I have a small frame and large breast and started having neck and back pain. I had one last chance and that was to get measured and when I did I found out my true bra size. Because the sizes are hard to find I went on Amazon. I am so happy I did and I love the Lilyette by Bali bra. It fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: 31bohohappy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shape, but cut into armpits.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bra so much. It gave a lovely shape to my breasts and the band was comfy--there was no back bulge. However, the cups rose up into my armpits, giving me odd armpit bulges. It will be my laundry day bra, not my first choice bra.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this bra!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra. It fits perfectly, which doesn't happen often when you wear a 38G. With most bras I've found that the cups don't come up high enough on the sides, under the arms, or there's bulging above the cups--but not with this bra. The underwire between the cups lies flat against my chest, so there's no mono-boob look. The lift is very good, too--no sagginess whatsoever. I ordered Raisin/Rose Creme and I'm very happy with the color.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: BIG girls wanna be Purty, too!
customer_reviews.text: I HATE to have to go bra shopping. Either they have clown patterns or look like something nurse Ratched wears under her uniform. This bra is classy and comfortable. I like that the straps are set just a tad wide and the Back, OMG, is like it's extra padded or something. It's Soft and giving. When I got this, I IMMEDIATELY ordered More! I followed the video Amazon has for measuring and I believe Bali has something too. Both were a great help.
customer_reviews.author: DA Elf

customer_reviews.title: Size are not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I hate minimizer's if you got big boobs they should be pushed up and out and shown to the world
customer_reviews.author: stephanie newman

customer_reviews.title: Supports well, but digs into armpits..
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and does seem to support well. This bra is not padded - from the picture I was not sure if it would be or not. Forget wearing this bra with a tank top or anything with even a slightly low necklace - the bra comes up so high that it will be visible. Even so, the main complaint I have is that it digs into my armpits. I’ve never had this happen with any other bra I’ve worn. Overall.... not the most comfortable bra but does seem to minimize and support well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Natural look, a little uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The fit was great for the most part. I had some discomfort due to how high the wires go in the center (which essentially makes the central "gore" as tall as the whole cup). For me, this bra gave pretty decent support while mot actually changing the shape, so the look and profile ended up pretty natural. It didn't really minimize for me, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy breasts. Stretches out in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: It was very comfortable when I first tried it on, however it is too weak and lacks support. The cups and band are stretchy. The elasticity is too weak on the straps. I've only had the bra for about 2 weeks or so and I have the bra straps as tight as they can go.
customer_reviews.author: MiP

customer_reviews.title: Made "the girls" migrate to my armpits!
customer_reviews.text: They aren't kidding with the "minimizing" effect. It was the strangest bra experience I think I've ever had. It's hard to explain, but it's not that the bra squishes the girls down or anything... it sort of shifts them off to the side, like towards your armpits, if that makes sense. It did NOT create a flattering silhouette on me and I had to return it (which was a super simple process). It did fit a little snug around the band, and there wasn't much elasticity to the bra in any capacity.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Fit ok but cleavage fit horrible.
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable and fit my skinny but big boob frame ok (5' 7', 130 lbs 36DD). However the underwire and fabric at the cleavage area (I'm sure there's a technical term for this) is too high, creating a little bump-out between my boobs. I only wear this with with sweaters or real baggy tops. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Roma Cranberry

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain and great bra
customer_reviews.text: A great bra, especially for full breasted folks that are tired of paying $75 a bra. Comfortable. I wear a 36 Ddd, even though the Nordstrom bra fitter said I wear a 38G, which were too big. Thanks for a quality product at a reasonable price. Very comfortable bra too!❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sugard49

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: The lace on the top of the bra ripped apart. I am no longer able to wear it as it causes my nipple to poke through and become raw from the constant rubbing. This I've worn this style for years. In fact, my 2 year old one of this exact style is still in the rotation with only one hook that is slightly twisted, but still able to be worn.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of many

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for the full figured women
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable; I have many colors. They are easy to wash and line dry. Good underwire that stays in place after many, many washes. The only reason it's not a 5 star is because the seams on the cups can show through on my blouses. Therefore when I wear a top that has a thin fabric, I wear a different bra. Otherwise this is very comfortable for the full figured women.
customer_reviews.author: Seven

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say thank you. I, being a very busty women, have never been able to find a bra that fits. I consistently have trouble with spilling over the cups, the band is too tight or the wires digs into my arm pits! This bra fits perfectly and is the most comfortable bra I have ever worn! The fabric is soft and it’s pretty. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable, lightweight and has held up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and its become one of my favorites. I am a 36DDD so it's hard to find styles that fit correctly. This has checked almost all of my boxes, except the straps are kind of short. This isn't something I usually have an issue with, but now that it's been worn multiple time it's very comfortable and the straps don't dig in at all like some do. the band fits really well, as well as the cups. For bra buying online this one is worth the risk
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Duppler

customer_reviews.title: 38G size and it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Wow I didn't think it was possible to find a perfect bra for my breasts size, boy was I wrong! After spending tons of money on other high end bras I've finally found one that is great in every way. My boobs does not sag, no rising in the back and it actually lifts them up. Awesome price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love a cheap bra in big ladies sizing, but this one is somewhat strange. The band sometimes feels too tight, sometimes too loose and this does direct your boobs to point outward, rather than straight forward. However, it’s very supportive and the cups are super comfortable. Overall, a happy buyer but definitely will be trying something else next bra purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: A nice product
customer_reviews.text: I just recommended this bra to two other friends. I am pleased with it and it is comfortable. I had to exchange the first one to a larger cup but there was no problem and I had the new bra in two days. So I ordered a second one. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy bra but strange breast shape.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE how comfortable this bra is! It's the most comfortable bra I have ever worn. No poking, pinching, slipping, it fits perfectly! I would buy one in every color. The only problem is that mesh panel on the top of the cup. It doesn't have any stretch so it flattens the breast at the top and in profile, my breasts look pointy or like ski jumps. Not the look I was going for. I am going to keep it because I've worn it and it feels weird to return it. So it will be the house bra or the laundry day bra, it IS super-duper comfy!
customer_reviews.author: JBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect support without padding.
customer_reviews.text: I hate bra shopping. I can never find something that fits right. This does! It's comfortable, and minimizes. It definitely doesn't push up, so if that's what you're looking for. this is not the bra for you. If you have large breasts that need to be tamed, but not padded, this bra is the one.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA M MAURIELLO

customer_reviews.title: larger sizes, beware!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a larger cup size, and the underwire sticks out on both sides, like wings jabbing actually into my upper arms with my arms down. Could it be a fluke defective item? Shrug. Too bad, as I usually love this brand and have worn the same style (but smaller cup) for years and never had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Francisco

customer_reviews.title: NICE BRA!!
customer_reviews.text: This bra fits me really well! I’m a 38DD, for a minimized it gives me a nicer shape than other minimizing bras, it doesn’t make me look squished, flattened & wide! Very comfy, excellent materials, very sturdy yet feminine...happy🤪just ordered one in black, my new “go to” bra!!
customer_reviews.author: s k s

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Absolutely the most comfortable bra I've ever worn. I forget it's there. Con: Zero nipple coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Radd

customer_reviews.title: Cups Slighty Off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bra but ended up returning it because the left cup rode up on my breast. It's normal for women to have slightly different sized cups and I haven't had this problem with other bras. It was cute and seemed like good quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: OkieGrace

customer_reviews.title: Fifteen minutes of comfortable support, and then...
customer_reviews.text: The structure of the bra is really comfortable and shapes well...for the first fifteen minutes of wear. After that, the underwires poke out in the middle and the cups start to lose shape. It's really weird, and a shame because it truly is quite comfortable at first. Every time I forget and wear it, I'm disappointed anew! I still gave three stars, because if they could fix that, it would be an awesome bra for large cup support.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Too small and tight
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 42DDD or 42DD depending on the bra. This bra is really small and uncomfortable. The bra just feels so tight! I have 42DD that fit better than these. I am not happy at all. Pretty bra, but I can’t wear it because it is tight and uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesilyn83

customer_reviews.title: it supports well because it is made well with sturdy material. Most bras are made with flimsy material ...
customer_reviews.text: I knew that the bra was going to fit properly because it is the bra I have been wearing for the last 6 years. It has been difficult to find, it supports well because it is made well with sturdy material. Most bras are made with flimsy material and at my size the other bras do not support well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Manning

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a very hard to find size. YES!~
customer_reviews.text: I buy this bra over and over in a variety of colors because I cannot find my size in any tradition chain store. I can find sizes at boutique lingerie shops but the bras start at $75 each! This bra comes in 34F or G and that is impossible to find elsewhere. It's not super cute in it's detailing or anything but it is well made and lasts. I would buy them all in my size if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: MEH - would I call it pretty? No
customer_reviews.text: MEH - would I call it pretty? No. Does it sit comfortably against my chest/breast bone? Also, no. Does it give me a fierce Madonna cone look? You betcha! Is that the look at 36 year old female wants? Not really... Its OK... the material is very very soft in on the band. The seam across the front of the cup shows in tee-shirts. It also seems to separate more than lift, so I have some push into my armpits. The problems with buying bras online though is you have to actually wear it and use it to see if it works... and then cant return it when it doesn't. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Jenandako

customer_reviews.title: Used Product
customer_reviews.text: This bra gets 5 stars for fit and comfort. I ordered 3, 1 had clearly been used, it was filthy, covered in white deodorant, and the lace was ripped. Amazon is replacing but make sure you check your purchase carefully. This never should have been resold!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Review

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy another one and again after this.
customer_reviews.text: This bra is WONDERFUL! For the ladies out there with a small frame and large breast, it doesn't dig into you. I have Mark's on my torso from bras. Makes me look like I've been physically abused. Please try this bra but get the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: No support whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand the great reviews on this. It felt like jiggle town. 36DD here. I would have wanted more support and structure, and couldn't wait to take it off. I also wanted a firmer material than the lace, which I didn't find flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus

customer_reviews.title: Just... Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Oh. My. Word. This is so comfortable and flattering. I do not like to wear a bra. At all. This has been my go-to since I bought it, though and I could not be more pleased with it. Especially at the price point. I need it in every design.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Beware, try your product recieved immediately
customer_reviews.text: the cup size was good but the fit was HORRIBLE. The support between the cups stuck out, would not lay down. I only wore it for 2 hrs and it was noticeable through my clothing. I took it off and came to return it and my return date had passed. Warning, try on your product from this company immediately, had I done that I would have gotten a refund verses have a bra that I will never wear again.
customer_reviews.author: AOM "Mary"

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bras. I really like the shape it gives as it minimizes the SIDES of my breast, which for me is what makes mine look bigger than they actually are. It's very comfortable. The only complaint I have is that there is a very prominent line going through the middle of the cups and it is very noticeable with thinner, fitted shirts. Other than that it would be the perfect bra!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Menzel

customer_reviews.title: Small Back Big Bust girls this bra is a must!!!! Say Goodbye to backpack straps!
customer_reviews.text: My entire life I am use to dreading the store for bra shopping. I took a chance on Amazon and found that this small back big bust combo can be bought for online, be beautiful, and affordable. I am buying one in every color because so far the two have not differed from each other in terms of fit. The underwire is actually comfortable and at 32 having a bra that fits that doesn't make me seem like i'm 80 is a plus. No more big backpack straps, and i've finally got some pretty back in a bra. Thank you Amazon and thank you Lilyette for finally making a pretty bra for a big bust!! Two Thumbs Up!! 34G
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Busted Girls — Just Don’t
customer_reviews.text: Upon arrival this bra was bliss. I immediately texted my friend and told her it was a must have! After wearing it for 20 minutes I realize that was a mistake. The wires worked their way to poke me in my armpits and also somehow poked up in the middle. I tried it again for the second time and it was just as bad as the first. Most uncomfortable bra ever!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee B.

customer_reviews.title: I can pull everything forward just fine, but the underwires are pushed away from my ...
customer_reviews.text: The band fit and fabric feel of this bra are very comfy... but the cups are not big enough. I can pull everything forward just fine, but the underwires are pushed away from my breastbone, instead of laying flat against it as they are supposed to. It's sad, because they don't offer it in an H, which I would snap up in a minute. Ç'est la vie. Experimenting now to find the correct fit in the Lilyette 428; 38G was too small in the band, but perfect in the cups; 40G was perfect in the band, but too large in the cups; hopefully the 40DDD will be just right.
customer_reviews.author: Regal Chanteuse

customer_reviews.title: ... time finding bras that fit but because of the great reviews and past experience with this brand I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I have somewhat of a hard time finding bras that fit but because of the great reviews and past experience with this brand I ordered two of the Lilyette bras. I have not been at all disappointed! They fit great and soooo comfortable. I ordered from another site on the web and paid $69.95 plus shipping for one bra that was very pretty but made for "model" figures. I am not a model and have big boobs! This bra is one of the best I've ever owned and would recommend it to any gal with 38+ bra size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these bras. Both of them have torn where the cup attaches to the strap, so that the cup is no longer attached to the strap. This means that almost all support is gone. I have never had this happen to any other bra I have owned. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Classical Homeschooling Mom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them. As a woman with large breasts I ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. As a woman with large breasts I am used to having to pay exorbitant amounts for bras this are flattering! These are comfortable and beautiful. I’ll check back in after a few washings and wears!
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Get Bra! But keep in mind...
customer_reviews.text: I am a 40DDD so it has been really heard find the right bra. This bra was just what I was looking for. I't comfortable, supportive, and doesn't dig into my skin. However, be aware this is not high quality so when you wash I would recommend putting the bra in a mesh bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jbug

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been?!!
customer_reviews.text: For an individual with a small band size (32-34) and a large cup size (DD-G, depending on weight fluctuations) finding comfy and stylish bra have been a nightmare!! This projects all my boxes: comfy, stylish, comfortable straps, underwire that doesn’t ding and smooths my bra fat!! 🙌🏾😄 I have not given a full days where yet but if there are any changes I will update my review. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Inderia R.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bra, strong, will support you well and doesn't look bad. I am a 34DDD or a 36DD and this 36DD runs big. Straps were slipping off when laying down and around the rib cage it seemed loose. Wearing on relax days but not when I need a LOT of support.
customer_reviews.author: Hulksmash

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: This bra is amazing. It's comfortable, pretty, and is also helping me to have better posture. With other non-minimizing bras I seem to hunch over to make my chest appear smaller, which has resulted in really really poor posture over the years. I am so grateful to whoever used their big brains to come up with something so perfect for big boobs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Try this if you're hard-to-fit
customer_reviews.text: I don't need the minimizer effect, since I'm already way down on the "low volume" side, but I think that's what makes it fit me so darn well. I have lots of trouble finding a bra that fits at all - need a bigger band and smaller cups and just generally different proportions of everything than are commonly found. So pleased to find that these offer a perfect fit for my shape. I just bought five more, in all the different colors I could get. The only way this could possibly be better is if it offered "t-shirt bra" type coverage, but it actually does a pretty good job of it for an unlined bra. And it looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: not a bad bra but would not purchase it again
customer_reviews.text: not a bad bra but would not purchase it again. bulges a bit between the breast, pokes under the arm somewhat. nice looking, light feeling though. I have had for a long while now and the wire has come out of both cups, but i still wear as a round the house bra.
customer_reviews.author: momma len

customer_reviews.title: but it is comfortable. I wear a 36DDD in the (lilyette by ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall this bra feels a bit big, but it is comfortable. I wear a 36DDD in the (lilyette by bali) plunge into comfort bra. I bought the same size in this bra, but I have some gapping in the cups. It does not minimize my chest, but does provide lift. There is no side or unibreast. It does not make me look wide but it does lift breasts forward.
customer_reviews.author: SellblocD

product_meta.title: Lilyette Women's Enchantment Three-Section Unlined Minimizer Underwire Bra
product_meta.description: Containment, support, elegant embroidery and lace support these sewn cups. It's time to go back to the heritage of intimates with seamed cups that allow for capacity, coverage and support. Traditional meets modern and functional.
feature_bullets: Full-coverage bra featuring sheer lace top panels with breathable mesh sides and bottom
